review: With fi reception range limited. Could not get it to work. Said signal was fair, but then failed to connect.
author: T. Dorman "TimD"

review: Nice little gadget for viewing amazon prime movies on a budget. Cheaper than but fewer channels, games and apps than a roku stick. I hope amazon will improve on choices and selections if it really means to compete with roku in the online streaming and smart TV arena...
author: average_john

review: It does everything we could want.  We purchased the Amazon Fire Stick to replace an older Roku that was giving us problems. Slow to buffer, re buffered often, poor streaming.  Now we have one of that.  The Fire Stick is amazing.
author: Granny Pam

review: No open platform and WiFi sometimes is slow that depends of the distance of the router.
author: Hiram I.

review: Awesome. No issues. Easy to use.
author: Shelia Martinez

review: Awesome  ....I like it because comes across ny televsion sharp and clear.
author: Geraldine R. Henderson

review: It's easy to use. Worth the cheap price!
author: Jessica

review: This is a good and useful product for the price. My only complaint is that it's only compatible with HBO Go and not HBO Now; why?
author: Benny
